inclusion.criterion: Participant has documented record of having received 1 dose of a quadrivalent meningococcal conjugate vaccine 4 to 10 years prior to study vaccination.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Participant aged 15 to < 18 years: assent form signed and dated by the participant and informed consent form (ICF) signed and dated by the parent or guardian.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Participant aged >=18 years: ICF signed and dated by the participant.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Receipt of oral or injectable antibiotic therapy within 72 hours prior to the first blood draw.
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Previous vaccination against meningococcal disease with either an investigational or approved meningococcal B vaccine.
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: The patient has a history of atypical hemolytic uremic syndrome and was treated with plasma exchange and corticosteroids. He has been previously vaccinated with meningococcal group ACWY conjugate vaccine and meningococcal group B vaccine.
